title: 单指令化生物血量
author: 繁琐Fansuo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 贰逼 于 2015-5-11 19:31 编辑 

将dragnoz的生物血量给单指令化了，下面是指令,直接复制粘贴到命令方块内激活即可：效果如图：
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~-22 ~1 redstone_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~2 ~ ~ ~-23 ~1 air},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~3 ~7 ~ {Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~6 ~ ~1 quartz_block}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add healthbar dummy healthbar},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-15 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=14,score_healthbar=14] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 12 {Health:12s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 0 {Health:0s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~5 ~-14 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=10,score_healthbar=10] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 14 {Health:14s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 2 {Health:2s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~6 ~-13 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=6,score_healthbar=6] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 16 {Health:16s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 4 {Health:4s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~7 ~-12 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=2,score_healthbar=2] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 18 {Health:18s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 6 {Health:6s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~8 ~-11 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 20 {Health:20s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 8 {Health:8s}},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~9 ~-10 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=18,score_healthbar=18] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 10 {Health:10s}},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-10 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=14,score_healthbar=14] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 12 {Health:13s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 1 {Health:1s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~5 ~-9 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=8,score_healthbar=8] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 14 {Health:15s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 2 {Health:3s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~6 ~-8 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=4,score_healthbar=4] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 16 {Health:17s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 4 {Health:5s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~7 ~-7 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=0,score_healthbar=0] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 18 {Health:19s}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 6 {Health:7s}},Time:1,}}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~8 ~-6 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=20,score_healthbar=20] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 8 {Health:9s}},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~9 ~-5 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/entitydata @e[score_healthbar_min=16,score_healthbar=16] {CustomName:"??????????"}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:scoreboard players set @e healthbar 10 {Health:11s}},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~3 ~-4 ~ ~9 ~-2 ~ redstone_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~3 ~-3 ~-1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~6 ~2 ~1 stone 0 replace redstone_block}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~6 ~2 ~-1 redstone_block 0 replace stone}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~-1 ~-2 ~10 ~1 ~2 stained_glass 0 replace quartz_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~3 ~ ~-1 ~9 ~5 ~1 air 0 replace quartz_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~ ~-2 ~10 ~4 ~2 quartz_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:stone,Time:1}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码



由于含有万国码，会显示为“？”txt文档的下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1kTgkTpl

replies.author: 林扬骐
replies.txt_content:
好厉害的……

提几个建议：把桃心换成别的字符比如空心方块与实心方块等
为了不卡顿只让玩家周围一部分显示血量，走远后清除

当然还有一个问题，就是玩指令的玩家会需要CustomName，这个最好是把是否命名的实体区分开来
